objects.text:
• CLINICALLY PROVEN FORMULA
• REMOVES 100% DANDRUFF
• MICRO MOISTURE SERUM
• NOURISHES FROM ROOT TO TIP

product_details.name: Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo for Dry, Itchy & Flaky Scalp, 650 ml
product_details.description: Scared of going out with white scalp flakes over your shoulder? When white flakes appear, all we want to know is how to prevent dandruff – and quickly. Say 'bye' to dandruff and dryness with the Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo. The ZPTO formula is clinically proven to target dandruff at its source. This shampoo removes dandruff* from your scalp without causing harm to your hair. Clinically tested, the formula enriched with ZPTO is proven to be successful at removing dandruff without leaving your hair dry & rough. ZPTO formula starts to clear visible flakes from the first wash. This gentle shampoo effectively relieves dandruff associated itches and clears up white flakes with regular use. The unique formula nourishes from roots up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*, for hair you can be proud of in no time. This anti-dandruff shampoo nourishes your hair from root up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*. Step out of the shower to soft, smooth and visibly flake- free strands*: quick results, with nourishing care, too. For best results, use Dove Dandruff Care shampoo along with Dove Dandruff Care conditioner together. *No visible flakes with regular product use, effect may vary with person.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern layout promoting an anti-dandruff shampoo. The design includes a prominent bold title (`heading`) and a vibrant subheading (`subheading`) at the top, both aligned to the left. A product image (`product_image`) is positioned on the right-hand side, anchoring the visual balance. The benefits of the product are listed clearly in a bullet-style (`description`), and the product name (`product_title`) is highlighted in uppercase for emphasis. A large price tag (`price`) is positioned at the bottom left, followed by a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta`) over a colored rectangle (`cta_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#1A5096)
- Golden Yellow (#E8B227)
- Light Sky Blue (#F2F7FB)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- White (#FFFFFF)

Overall, the banner combines brand-oriented visuals with engaging typography and strategic call-to-action placement, optimized for product marketing.
product_color: The product image for Dove Anti Dandruff Shampoo utilizes a clean and professional color palette that evokes purity, care, and trust. The dominant colors are **white (#FFFFFF)** for a clean base, **deep blue (#1A3D8F)** representing trust and efficacy, and **golden yellow (#D8B45D)** for highlighting premium quality. The **light gray (#787878)** of the pump cap adds neutrality and balance. Soft blue gradients in the water splash image indicate moisture and freshness, blending smoothly with white to emphasize purity. The contrast between blue text and golden accents draws attention to clinical strength and ingredients. These elements work harmoniously to ensure the product appears reliable, gentle, and effective.
